<title level="1" pfs="">[Yabin the Just (Level 9)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1448)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Yabin the Just (Level 9)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1448)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 11</row>

**Perception** +18; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Nagaji](/Languages.aspx?ID=87), [Tengu](/Languages.aspx?ID=47), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +19, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17)_, _+1 [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +15 

+1 status to all saves vs. [poison](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=24)
</row>

**HP** 130

**Resistances**
poison 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_bo staff_ +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 2d8+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
venom +18 ([range 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** nagaji venom

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 27, attack +20
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Spell Immunity](/Spells.aspx?ID=296), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Chromatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=37), [Cloak of Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=41), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180) (2 slots)

**Sorcerer Bloodline Spells** DC 27, 2 Focus Points
- **5th**
[Dragon Breath](/Spells.aspx?ID=499), [Dragon Claws](/Spells.aspx?ID=500)

**Nagaji Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison and [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) (1 round); **Stage 3** 4d6 poison and [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) (1 round)

</column>
name: Yabin the Just (Level 9)
